oaidtb.boosters
Interface IterativeUpdatableClassifier

All Known Implementing Classes:
Booster, AdaBoostMH
public interface IterativeUpdatableClassifier

Interface for classifiers that can be updated (refined) at any time by performing more iterations

Version:
$Revision: 1.0 $
Author:
Santiago David Villalba Bartolomé

 double[] getClassifierVote(weka.core.Instance instance, int iterationIndex)
          Get the classifier's vote for the instance at iteration; the (vectorial) sum of all iterations classifier's vote vectors must be the final combined hypothesis of the classifier.

                    throws java.lang.Exception

getClassifierVote

public double[] getClassifierVote(weka.core.Instance instance,
                                  int iterationIndex)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
Get the classifier's vote for the instance at iteration; the (vectorial) sum of all iterations classifier's vote vectors must be the final combined hypothesis of the classifier.
Parameters:
instance - The instance to be classified
iterationIndex - The iteration index
Returns:
The vote of the classifier's iteration to the overall classifier
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs
